abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33231204, pmid33306283, pmid33301434, pmid33301431, pmid33264543, pmid33263384, pmid33059515
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.12.22
